title: What is the difference between integrative medicine, functional medicine and naturopathy?
description: Answer (1 of 13): Integrative medicine is a blend of uptodate Western medicine and less conventional treatment modalities like acupuncture, herbs and homeopathy. An integrative MD will study and order blood tests like ordinary doctor, but will include less conventional methods of treatment (after...
